data.comment: The match is underway in Nuevo Leon.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Tigres.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 3, Guadalajara are pushing forward but Alexis Vega's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 7, In Nuevo Leon Tigres attack through Guido Pizarro. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Fernando Guerrero awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Tigres have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 11, Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 12, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
Rafael Carioca (Tigres) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Alexis Vega for Guadalajara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fernando Guerrero awards Tigres a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Guadalajara have a dangerous throw-in.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Tigres drive upfield and Jesus Duenas gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Guadalajara defender.
In the minute 17, Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
Guadalajara surge into the attack at Estadio Universitario (UANL) but Jose Maciasâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 19, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Uriel Antuna scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Great play from Hiram Mier to set up the goal.
In the minute 25, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tigres's Rafael Carioca has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Throw-in Tigres.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 29, Tigres attack but Diego Reyes's header doesn't find the target.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 30, Isaac Brizuela of Guadalajara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guadalajara are coming forward and Miguel Ponce gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 32, Fernando Guerrero awards Tigres a goal kick.
Free kick Guadalajara.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 36, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Miguel Ponce is booked for the away team.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 42, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tigres.
Fernando Beltran (Guadalajara) has received a first yellow card.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Miguel Ponce in Guadalajara has been yellow-carded a second time by Fernando Guerrero and is being sent off.
In the minute 45, Guadalajara's Jose Macias misses with an attempt on goal.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Fernando Guerrero blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 47, Tigres pushes forward through Andre Pierre Gignac, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 47, Tigres make their first substitution with Julian Quinones replacing Luis Quinones.
Ricardo Ferretti (Tigres) is making a second substitution, with Eduardo Vargas replacing Leonardo Fernandez.
Victor Vucetich is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Universitario (UANL) with Cristian Calderon replacing Fernando Beltran.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 48, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 52, Jose Macias (Guadalajara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's now 0-2 in Nuevo Leon as Jose Macias scores for Guadalajara.
In the minute 54, Alexis Vega instrumental with a fine assist.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 57, Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac has been booked in Nuevo Leon.
Guadalajara's Uriel Antuna gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 60, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jesus Molina for Guadalajara who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Nicolas Lopez is on a sub for Javier Aquino for Tigres.
Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a second change, with Jose Vazquez replacing the possibly injured Jesus Molina.
In the minute 63, Tigres's Nicolas Lopez breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 64, Goal! Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Nicolas Lopez.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Guadalajara just outside Tigres's area.
In the minute 66, In Nuevo Leon Guadalajara attack through Jose Macias. The finish is off target, however.
Fernando Guerrero awards Tigres a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Tigres throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
In the minute 68, In Nuevo Leon Tigres drive forward through Andre Pierre Gignac. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Julian Quinones (Tigres) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
The away team replace Isaac Brizuela with Jesus Angulo.
In the minute 70, The away team have replaced Uriel Antuna with Antonio Briseno. This is the fourth substitution made today by Victor Vucetich.
Tigres's Eduardo Vargas is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Tigres are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Guadalajara are coming forward and Cristian Calderon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 75, Dieter Villalpando is replacing Alexis Vega for the away team.
In the minute 76, Gilberto Sepulveda Lopez (Guadalajara) gets a yellow card.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Throw-in Tigres.
In the minute 78, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Francisco Venegas is replacing Julian Quinones for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara's Jose Macias gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Fernando Guerrero awards Tigres a goal kick.
Andre Pierre Gignac of Tigres gets in a strike, but is off target.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Great finish from Jesus Angulo to give Guadalajara a 1-3 lead.
